description:
The tomato plants they planted in spring are bearing lots of tomatoes, and it`s time to harvest them. After tasting one of the tomatoes she raised herself, Renge is overwhelmed by the delicious flavor and decides to take some tomatoes to everyone, declaring herself a midsummer Santa Claus. Her last stop is the candy store, but on the way there, she meets an unfamiliar little girl who`s crying because she`s lost. Renge isn`t sure what to do, so she makes a decision...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Turned Into Santa to Deliver Tomatoes
Tomato o Todokeru Santa ni Natta
トマトを届けるサンタになった
